briefdescription.para: Deserialises and processes the messageBody received from the network through the provided receiveCommandHandler .

parameterdescription.para: A serialised IMessage.

The network id of the IMessage.
The signature of the IMessage.

memberdef.name: DefaultReceiveCommand

briefdescription.para: The default command handler that check if the ICommand<TAuthenticationToken> has already been processed by this framework, checks if the ICommand<TAuthenticationToken> is required, finds the handler from the provided routeManager .

parameterdescription.para: The ICommand<TAuthenticationToken> to process.
The RouteManager to get the ICommandHandler<TAuthenticationToken,TCommand> from.
The current framework.

simplesect.para: True indicates the command was successfully handled by a handler. False indicates the command wasn't handled, but didn't throw an error, so by convention, that means it was skipped. Null indicates the commandcommand wasn't handled as it was already handled.

The current framework.

simplesect.para: True indicates the event was successfully handled by a handler. False indicates the event wasn't handled, but didn't throw an error, so by convention, that means it was skipped. Null indicates the event wasn't handled as it was already handled.
